name: fetch_business_data
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool whatsapp_data.
Tool description: fetch whatsapp profiles data
API description: The endpoint will provide: `description`, `website`, `email`, `business hours`, `address` and `category`; if the number is a whatsapp for business account.

phone.description: The phone number of the WhatsApp business account for which data is being requested.
